greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=1; for n > 1, a(n) = 7*6^(wt(n-1)-1).
comment: wt(n) is the Hamming weight = binary weight of n (A000120).
example: Written as an irregular triangle in which the row lengths are the terms of A011782 the sequence begins:
It appears that the right border gives A003949.
It appears that the row sums give A000420.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 25 2009
